title: Animated Tab Indicator
description: Create a custom animated tab bar with a sliding indicator.
instructions: Build a horizontal tab bar with 3 tabs. When a tab is selected, animate an underline indicator to slide to that tab's position. Use TweenAnimationBuilder to animate the indicator position and AnimatedOpacity to highlight the selected tab text.

hints.text: Use LayoutBuilder to get the available width and calculate tab positions
TweenAnimationBuilder<double> can animate the left position of the indicator
AnimatedDefaultTextStyle is great for animating text weight and color

commonMistakes.consequence: Tab bar doesn't adapt to screen size
commonMistakes.correction: Use LayoutBuilder to calculate widths dynamically

commonMistakes.mistake: Not using Expanded for tabs in Row
commonMistakes.correction: Wrap each tab in Expanded widget
